messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

only displays over days sent thursday re notification annual leave days visible resolved hello guys have checked only displays over days but none days for year can you advise thanks her incident manager dec sent thursday notification annual leave days visible resolved importance high dear please be advised issue regarding annual leave days being visible resolved should you wish submit any annual leave special leave requests you can follow normal procedure we apologize for any inconveniences might have caused if you were encounter any other issues please let know thank you kind regards ext hub sent wednesday notification annual leave days visible update hello please be advised we still investigating absences issue with high priority meanwhile please note you won be able submit any annual leave special leave requests should you need book any days off within working week please liaise with responsible teams manually update your absence records into germany colombia bogota macedonia if you have any other questions please contact thank you for your collaboration understanding ext hub sent tuesday notification annual leave days visible dear please be advised we still investigating absences issue with high priority meanwhile please note won allow you submit any annual leave special leave requests should you need book any days off within working week please liaise with responsible teams manually update your absence records into germany colombia bogota macedonia if you have any other questions please contact thank you kind regards ext hub sent tuesday notification annual leave days visible dear please be advised annual leave days cannot be seen needs be updated accordingly our engineers investigating issue with high priority we get back you with updates when available please note applies locations should you have any questions please hesitate contact thank you kind regards ext hub

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to classify this IT ticket. The categories available include "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," and "Administrative Rights." The ticket addresses issues with visibility of annual leave days and notifications related to absences and leave requests. Since this involves HR system functionality, "HR Support" is likely the most suitable category. While "Access" might seem relevant, it really pertains to HR leave management, so I’ll go with "HR Support" for my response.**Producing JSON Output**

The prompt is asking me to categorize an IT ticket using the provided schema. I know I need to format my response correctly in JSON. The appropriate category for this ticket is "HR Support," so I will write it as: {"category":"HR Support"}. I don't need to include any analysis details in my final output—just the category will suffice. I’m ready to deliver this!
